title: Baptistry of Neon
description: An octagonal brick structure erected by Bishop Ursus (late fourth or early fifth century AD) as part of a  Basilica (destroyed in 1734). Bishop Neon completed the baptistry at the end of the fifth century AD.

properties.description: An octagonal brick structure erected by Bishop Ursus (late fourth or early fifth century AD) as part of a  Basilica (destroyed in 1734). Bishop Neon completed the baptistry at the end of the fifth century AD.
